top_comments.comment: 23:22 The way Jon says that makes it seem like it's *his* "criminal context"

comments_since_last_sample.body:
The Gears Franchise has a slew of interesting weapons.
Pretty sure Jonathan would like them.
And probably not lose his mind XD
20:10 there is a frame that has all the holes in the handguard he says are missing
10:46 no ammo left but i clearly see a live round in the mag...
For the ak reload, I you have a Chinese, Korean, or polymer mag it will snap the lip on the magazine and break it.
I would like to see how the firearms expert reaction to Generation Zero weapons.
I think that the weapons from the Wolfenstein series would be great for Johnathan to review
23:22 The way Jon says that makes it seem like it's *his* "criminal context"
Man you guys didn't show him the UMP45 or MP5 and how the thumb slide "magically" flys back into locked position when you reload, Oh he would have been annoyed.
It is indeed very distracting to see the bolt/slide lock back with a partial mag in.
It’s clear that it was called Back 4 Blood 🩸 for more than one reason! I felt like using hand sanitizer watching the Gameplay!
I wonder if Jonathan Ferguson can react to the guns in No More Room in Hell.
Dang I was kinda hoping to hear something about the UMP45
I wanna see possibly a RE 4 VR
